title: afk players still not fixed (remake bullcrap)
body: ok so essentially we started a game and one of the players had Disconnected, connected again at about 20 seconds, moved a little bit then Dc'd again!! remake was not an option because the player moved a little bit. that's an utter joke, the option to remake was not allowed. the guy didn't even buy any items.  Fair enough Riot have made remake which is good but they haven't perfected it. once it senses movement from all players remake is not allowed is a joke. they really need to fix, Seriously. interested to hear what u guys reckon
